com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection

Interface TransformableSelection

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MutableSelection, Selection, StaticImageTransformable, Transformable, TransformableImageSelection
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LassoTool, SelectionTool

    public interface TransformableSelection
extends TransformableImageSelection
    Represents a selection that can be transformed using operations that affect both the pixels of the selected image (i.e., change of brightness or opacity) and/or the selection's shape and location (i.e., flip, rotate or translate).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void applyTransform(AffineTransform transform)
      Applies an AffineTransform the current image.
      default void flipHorizontal()
      Flips or mirrors the image along its vertical axis.
      default void flipVertical()
      Flips or mirrors the image along its horizontal axis.
      default void rotateLeft()
      Rotates the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.
      default void rotateRight()
      Rotates the image 90 degrees clockwise.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.TransformableImageSelection

        fill, transform, transform

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.MutableSelection

        resetSelection, setDirty, setSelectedImage, setSelectionOutline, translateSelection

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.tools.selection.Selection

        crop, getCanvas, getIdentitySelectionFrame, getSelectedImage, getSelectionFrame, getSelectionLocation, hasSelection, redrawSelection

      • Methods inherited from interface com.defano.jmonet.algo.transform.image.Transformable

        adjustBrightness, adjustTransparency, convolve, invert, operate, reduceColor, reduceGreyscale, removeTranslucency

    • Method Detail

      • rotateLeft

        default void rotateLeft()
        Rotates the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise.

      • rotateRight

        default void rotateRight()
        Rotates the image 90 degrees clockwise.

      • flipHorizontal

        default void flipHorizontal()
        Flips or mirrors the image along its vertical axis. That is, all pixels on the left side of the image will move the right side and vice versa.

      • flipVertical

        default void flipVertical()
        Flips or mirrors the image along its horizontal axis. That is, all pixels on the top of the image will move to the bottom and vice versa.

      • applyTransform

        default void applyTransform(AffineTransform transform)
        Applies an AffineTransform the current image.
        Parameters:
        transform - The transform to apply.
